# GettingStartedInputFile.tcl -- Load Combinations

__NOTOC__ ```Tcl

  1. LOAD COMBINATIONS ---------------------------------------

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel GravityOnly addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationDescription "Push Frame to 12 inch" addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel LL1 addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel StaticPushover addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationDescription "Push Frame to 12 inch" addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel LL1 addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel StaticPushover DMax 0.1*\$in addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel StaticPushover DMax 11.9*\$in DisplacementIncrement 0.5*\$in addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel StaticPushoverZ addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationDescription "Push Frame to 12 inch" addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel LL1 addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel StaticPushover DMax 0.1*\$in LateralDirection Z addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel StaticPushover DMax 11.9*\$in DisplacementIncrement 0.5*\$in LateralDirection Z addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel StaticPushoverCycles addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 LoadFactor 0.9 addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel LL1 LoadFactor 0.7 addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel StaticPushover CycleType Full DisplacementIncrement 0.25*\$in \ DMax "0.01 0.05 0.1" DMaxFactor BuildingHeight addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel MaxEQX addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 LoadFactor 0.9 addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel EQ LoadFactor 1.5 TmaxAnalysis 10*\$sec GMfilename "H-E01140.AT2" addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel MaxEQXbig addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 LoadFactor 0.9 addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel EQ LoadFactor 3.5 TmaxAnalysis 10*\$sec GMfilename "H-E01140.AT2" addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel MaxEQZ addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 LoadFactor 0.9 addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel EQ LoadFactor 1.5 TmaxAnalysis 10*\$sec GMfilename "H-E12140.AT2" GMdirection Z addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel MaxEQ2D addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 LoadFactor 1. addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel EQ2D TmaxAnalysis 15.*\$sec addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel MaxEQ2Drot addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 LoadFactor 1. addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel EQ2D TmaxAnalysis 15.*\$sec GMfilenameX "H-E12140.AT2" GMfilenameZ "H-E01140.AT2" addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel MaxEQ3D addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 LoadFactor 1. addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel EQ3D TmaxAnalysis 5.*\$sec GMscaleX 1.2 GMscaleZ 1.1 addLoadCombination

addLoadCombinationData LoadCombinationLabel MaxEQ3Drot addLoadCombinationData -GravityLoad LoadLabel DL1 LoadFactor 1. addLoadCombinationData -LateralLoad LoadLabel EQ3D TmaxAnalysis 5.*\$sec GMfilenameX "H-E12140.AT2" GMfilenameZ "H-E01140.AT2" GMscaleX 1.1 GMscaleZ 1.2 addLoadCombination puts --DoneLoadCombinations--

```
